A world made entirely of ice cream, where people can roll down hills of different flavors and enjoy endless treats.
A planet where ice cream is used as currency, and people can trade it for goods and services.
A frozen wasteland where only ice cream creatures, such as ice cream men and women, exist and thrive.
A planet where people can only communicate through the language of ice cream, and must learn new flavors to understand different cultures.
A world where theonga, a mythical creature said to eat ice cream from the moon, reigns supreme, and people must learn to live in harmony with this powerful creature.
